participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, Alex often reflects on their past experiences while exploring new interests. They can be humorous but also struggle with feelings of inadequacy.
participant_1.background: i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Confident and a bit impulsive, Jordan is open about his experiences and enjoys discussing various topics, although he sometimes lacks awareness of how his words might affect others.
participant_2.background: i live in canada. i didn't graduate high school. i'm in the army. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.

content.text: How are you?
I am good. how about you? do you like roleplaying? I do
Iâ€™m not that into role playing.  Where are you from?
I am from california. do you have any hobbies? I like playing roleplaying
Oh cool, Iâ€™m from Ontario Canada.  For hobbies I like skeet shooting, reminds me of my days in the Army.
that is cool. I like to spend time with my hair. do you work?
Iâ€™m currently on disability, I lost a leg due to an IED in Afghanistan.  Hoping to get a job working with data soon.
that sounds like fun. do you get to work with your job?
I donâ€™t have a job!  But hoping to work soon.  How about you?  Do you work?
I do. I work as a veterinarian. what do you do?
Oh thatâ€™s very intriguing, which types of animals do you work with most?  I have a cat.
I do not have time for animals. I work from the home
So the animals you work on come to your home?
Or do you just merely consult via the telecom?
no, but I do like to work on my hair. what about you
that sounds fun. I just went to the internet. do you play sports?
Itâ€™s ok, I often struggle with context as well.  I play soccer, and water polo.  Where on the internet did you go?
I did not go to school. I hated it
I didnâ€™t finish school either.  Too many abstract subjects I wasnâ€™t interested in.
that is a good idea. what is your dream job to do?
I respectfully disagree, dropping out of school has been a very poor idea. What would be my dream job?  Working on a machine learning startup would be fun.
Do you speak any other languages
that would be cool. what kind of machine?
no, I don't. do you? I am a veterinarian. what about yourself?

Computers.  Nowadays you can write programs with advanced mathematical models to understand more about the world or human behavior.  I speak a little Spanish.  Some python ðŸ¤£.  Do you enjoy being a veteranarian?
yes, I do. it is a fun job. what do you
Youâ€™re so interested in what I do, if you recall, I informed you Iâ€™m unemployed at the moment.  Kind of rude of you to keep asking.
yes, it is. do you like
